html: I’ve been asking SW WA residents who commute to Portland for work if they have any say in when they start their work day. David says he has no choice, which means if Oregon has its way and implements tolls on I-5 and I-205, he’ll be paying a premium price to commute to work.

*Wages rose at the fastest rate since mid-2009; average hourly private-sector earnings were up 2.9% over the previous year.

*Unemployment rate is 3.9%. 

I’ll keep supporting solutions that spur economic well-being for Southwest Washington residents.

html: Sea lions have eaten 45% of returning spring chinook. This isn't a healthy ecosystem. Methods up to this point to control sea lions are not working. I met w/ local officials to view sea lion predation & talk about my bipart. bill to make lethal sea lion removal a stronger tool.pic.twitter.com/ehWdB0X0EI
text: Sea lions have eaten 45% of returning spring chinook. This isn't a healthy ecosystem. Methods up to this point to control sea lions are not working. I met w/ local officials to view sea lion predation & talk about my bipart. bill to make lethal sea lion removal a stronger tool.pic.twitter.com/ehWdB0X0EI

html: Salmon, steelhead fishermen: Are u worried about sea lions eating endangered fish? This is a growing problem in the Columbia River. text: Salmon, steelhead fishermen: Are u worried about sea lions eating endangered fish? This is a growing problem in the Columbia River. html: Meet Ji Seong-ho, one of POTUS’ guests at the #SOTU, who escaped North Korea. He carried his old crutches as a reminder of the horrors he suffered after losing his legs while suffering under extreme poverty in N. Korea & he now aims to help others escape. text: Meet Ji Seong-ho, one of POTUS’ guests at the #SOTU, who escaped North Korea.
